sentences.chinese: 电影的最后一个场景

sentences.english: the end of the day
sentences.chinese: 一天的末了

sentences.english: to be proud of sth
sentences.chinese: 为某事自豪

detailed_translations.english: used to show what a part belongs to or comes from

sentences.english: She often works at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她周末经常要上班。

sentences.english: If you wash your hair too often, it can get too dry.
sentences.chinese: 如果洗头过勤，头发会变得干枯。

sentences.english: How often do you see your parents?
sentences.chinese: 你隔多久去看你父母？

sentences.english: Robin is a difficult child; you’ve said so yourself often enough (= a lot of times ).
sentences.chinese: 罗宾是个难管的孩子，你自己也常常这么说。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens often, it happens regularly or many times

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: They partook of our triumph.
sentences.chinese: 他们分享我们的胜利。

sentences.english: She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.english: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

sentences.english: children shouting and running in the playground
sentences.chinese: 在操场上叫嚷奔跑的孩子们

detailed_translations.english: an area for children to play, especially at a school or in a park, that often has special equipment for climbing on, riding on etc

sentences.english: the sport of falconry
sentences.chinese: 放鹰狩猎运动

sentences.english: a demonstration by people opposed to blood sports
sentences.chinese: 反对猎杀动物运动的人士举行的示威游行

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑
detailed_translations.english: an activity that people do in the countryside, especially hunting or fishing
to play together happily

sentences.english: Stop throwing those stones!
sentences.chinese: 别再扔那些石头了！

detailed_translations.english: to block a hole or pipe so that water, smoke etc cannot go through it
if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening

sentences.english: They have their compensations.
sentences.chinese: 他们有他们的报酬。

sentences.english: My pulses, her pulses, their pulses.
sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

sentences.english: We love playing basketball.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱打篮球。

sentences.english: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

detailed_translations.english: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net

sentences.english: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.chinese: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.english: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥一直照顾我。

sentences.english: my twin brother
sentences.chinese: 我的双胞胎兄弟

sentences.english: We must work together, brothers!
sentences.chinese: 我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

detailed_translations.english: a male who has the same parents as you

sentences.english: He wanted to ask her, but he didn’t dare.
sentences.chinese: 他想问她，但又不敢。

sentences.english: ‘I’ll tell Dad.’ ‘You wouldn’t dare!’
sentences.chinese: “我要告诉爸爸。” “谅你也不敢！”

sentences.english: How dare you accuse me of lying!
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢说我撒谎！

detailed_translations.english: to be brave enough to do something that is risky or that you are afraid to do – used especially in questions or negative sentences

sentences.english: Can you drive?
sentences.chinese: 你会开车吗？

sentences.english: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.english: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

detailed_translations.english: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

sentences.english: These results are firsts in the history of women’s athletics.
sentences.chinese: 这些成绩在女运动员历史上是第一次。

sentences.english: First I had to decide what to wear.
sentences.chinese: 首先我得决定穿什么。

detailed_translations.english: 1st
at the beginning

sentences.english: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere quickly and suddenly

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

sentences.english: The film reveals Fellini’s genius.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片展现了费里尼的天赋。

sentences.english: a work of pure genius
sentences.chinese: 天才之作

detailed_translations.english: a very high level of intelligence, mental skill, or ability, which only a few people have

sentences.english: Both boys and girls can apply to join the choir.
sentences.chinese: 男孩和女孩均可申请加入合唱团。

sentences.english: Girls! Please be quiet.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们！请安静。

sentences.english: a teenage girl
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的女孩

sentences.english: They have two girls and a boy.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .
sentences.chinese: 琼为她钢琴伴奏。

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

sentences.english: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.chinese: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。

sentences.english: staff and pupils
sentences.chinese: 教职员工和学生

sentences.english: a star pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名优秀的小学生

sentences.english: a third-grade pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名三年级小学生

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being taught, especially a child

name: right
trans: 好的，对〔用于表示明白或同意某人的话〕

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
an occasion when someone takes photographs or makes a film

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

sentences.english: ski slopes
sentences.chinese: 滑雪坡

sentences.english: a ski resort (= where people can go skiing )
sentences.chinese: 滑雪度假胜地

sentences.english: ...the Swiss ski resort of Klosters.
sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.english: ...a private ski instructor.
sentences.chinese: …一位私人滑雪教练。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

name: superstar
trans: 超级巨星〔尤指音乐家或电影演员〕

sentences.english: Our table tennis team captured three gold medals at the games.
sentences.chinese: 我们的乒乓球队在比赛中赢得了三块金牌。

sentences.english: In table tennis, the eyes see the ball coming, judge its speed and direction, and pass this information on to the brain.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，打乒乓球的时候，眼睛看到球打过来，判断其速度和方向，马上将这个信息传给大脑。

detailed_translations.english: an indoor game played on a table by two or four players who hit a small plastic ball to each other across a net

sentences.english: Joe got up and left without a word of thanks .
sentences.chinese: 乔起身离开了，一句感谢的话也没有说。

sentences.english: ‘Pass the salt, please…thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “请把盐递过来…谢谢。”

detailed_translations.english: used to tell someone that you are grateful for something they have given you or done for you
the things you say or do to show that you are grateful to someone

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.english: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.chinese: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
an attempt to do something

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

sentences.english: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.chinese: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.english: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

detailed_translations.english: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: Draw a circle 10cm in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径10厘米的圆形。

sentences.english: Johnson was part of the President’s inner circle (= the people who have the most influence ) .
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是总统核心集团的人。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, fashion comes full circle.
sentences.chinese: 时尚迟早会流行回来的。

sentences.english: This is the road that circles the city.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那条环城路。

detailed_translations.english: a completely round shape, like the letter O
to move in the shape of a circle around something, especially in the air

sentences.english: His height had increased by 2.5 cm.
sentences.chinese: 他的身高增加了2.5厘米。

detailed_translations.english: a unit of length in the metric system equal to ten millimetres or one-hundredth of a meter

sentences.english: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.chinese: 你的纽扣掉了。

sentences.english: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

detailed_translations.english: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

name: fete
trans: 〔一般为募捐而组织的〕游乐会

sentences.english: The pop star flew 100 friends in from London and Paris for a two-day fete.
sentences.chinese: 这名歌星从伦敦和巴黎把100位朋友空运过来参加一个两天的游园会。

detailed_translations.english: A fete is a fancy party or celebration

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

sentences.english: Fold the paper along the dotted line.
sentences.chinese: 沿虚线将纸折起来。

sentences.english: It’ll fit in if you fold it in half .
sentences.chinese: 对折的话就能放下了。

detailed_translations.english: to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

sentences.english: I'm from Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我是意大利人。

detailed_translations.english: used to show what the origin of sb/sth is

sentences.english: The train was completely full.
sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.english: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.english: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.chinese: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

detailed_translations.english: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left

name: have
trans: 举办〔会议、聚会、音乐会等〕

sentences.english: Our guests have arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我们的客人到了。

sentences.english: Has anyone phoned?
sentences.chinese: 有人打过电话来吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.english: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 我已经15年没见他了。

sentences.english: ‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.chinese: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.english: You haven’t done much, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你没做多少，是吗？

sentences.english: They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.english: She sat down and had another drink.
sentences.chinese: 她坐下来又喝了一杯。

detailed_translations.chinese: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
detailed_translations.english: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say that someone owns something or that it is available for them to use

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

name: in
trans: 〔表示某事完成或发生的方式〕

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: Draw a straight line across the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在这一页的上方画一条直线。

sentences.english: Sign your name on the dotted line (= line made up of a series of dots ).
sentences.chinese: 在虚线上签名。

sentences.english: The edges of the pitch are marked by white lines.
sentences.chinese: 球场的四边画着白线。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to stop the ball going over the line.
sentences.chinese: 守门员刚好把球截住，没有让它越过球门线。

sentences.english: He raced towards the finishing line.
sentences.chinese: 他朝终点线冲刺。

sentences.english: The four men were standing in a line on the other side of the table.
sentences.chinese: 那四个男人在桌子的另一边站成一排。

sentences.english: Light travels in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 光沿直线传播。

sentences.english: A boat came into my line of vision (= direction I was looking in ).
sentences.chinese: 一艘船进入了我的视线。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin mark on a piece of paper, the ground, or another surface

sentences.english: He was nursed in London.
sentences.chinese: 他是在伦敦长大的。

sentences.english: I trained to London.
sentences.chinese: 我乘火车到伦敦。

sentences.english: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.chinese: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment with Miss Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 我想约一下泰勒小姐。

detailed_translations.english: used in front of the family name of a woman who is not married to address her politely, to write to her, or to talk about her

sentences.english: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我这个月底能完成工作。

sentences.english: She earns about £350 a month (= each month ).
sentences.chinese: 她每月约挣350英镑。

sentences.english: We update the schedule at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们至少每月更新一次日程表。

detailed_translations.english: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
sentences.chinese: 你叫什么名字？

sentences.english: He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.english: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

detailed_translations.english: what someone is called
to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially

sentences.english: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.chinese: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

sentences.english: The full address is given on page 15.
sentences.chinese: 详细地址见第15页。

sentences.english: You will find the answers over the page .
sentences.chinese: 答案见下页。

sentences.english: a 400﹣page novel
sentences.chinese: 一本400页的小说

sentences.english: We took out a full page advertisement in the ‘Village Voice’.
sentences.chinese: 我们在《村声》上投放了一整版广告。

detailed_translations.english: one side of a piece of paper in a book, newspaper, document etc, or the sheet of paper itself

sentences.english: Children under 14 should be accompanied by a parent.
sentences.chinese: 14 岁以下儿童须由一位家长陪同。

sentences.english: The eggs are guarded by both parents.
sentences.chinese: 那些蛋由两只亲鸟共同守护着。

sentences.english: Melissa’s spending the weekend at her parents’ house.
sentences.chinese: 梅利莎正在父母家度周末。

detailed_translations.english: the father or mother of a person or animal

sentences.english: The room had several pictures on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.english: a book with pictures in it
sentences.chinese: 带插图的书

sentences.english: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.chinese: 他请求她允许为她画像。

detailed_translations.english: shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

sentences.english: Suppose the width of a rectangle is x metres.
sentences.chinese: 设长方形的宽是 x 米。

detailed_translations.english: a shape that has four straight sides, two of which are usually longer than the other two, and four 90˚ angles at the corners

sentences.english: We sat round the table playing cards.
sentences.chinese: 我们围桌而坐玩纸牌。

sentences.english: Gather round! I have an important announcement to make.
sentences.chinese: 大家围拢来！我有重要事情要宣布。

sentences.english: He put his arm gently round her waist.
sentences.chinese: 他轻轻地搂着她的腰。

sentences.english: I kept the key on a chain round my neck.
sentences.chinese: 我给钥匙穿了根链子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: The ballroom’s huge, with windows all the way round .
sentences.chinese: 舞厅很大，四周都是窗户。

sentences.english: There was a lovely courtyard with tables all round .
sentences.chinese: 有一个漂亮的庭院，四周都是桌子。

detailed_translations.english: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone
shaped like a circle
a round of events is a series of related events, which are part of a longer process
on the other side of something, or to the other side of it without going through it or over it

sentences.english: Her perfume has always had the same effect on me.
sentences.chinese: 她身上的香水给我的感觉一如既往。

sentences.english: He’s the same old Peter – moody and irritable.
sentences.chinese: 他还是以前那个彼得——喜怒无常且爱发火。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相同的；同一的；上述的（通常与the连用）；无变化的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that a particular person or thing does not change

detailed_translations.chinese: 同样的事物或人（通常与the连用）
detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are exactly like each other
in the same way

sentences.english: If you offer him another hundred, I think he’ll sell.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再加一百元钱，我想他会卖的。

sentences.english: He regrets selling all his old records.
sentences.chinese: 他后悔把所有的老唱片都卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone in exchange for money

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: strip
trans: 条，狭条状物〔指纸、布料等〕

sentences.english: Strip the beds and wash the sheets.
sentences.chinese: 把床单撤下来清洗。

sentences.english: a strip of paper
sentences.chinese: 一张纸条

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
a long narrow piece of paper, cloth etc

sentences.english: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

sentences.english: Yes, it is like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 是的，它象一个三角形。

sentences.english: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.english: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

sentences.english: Can I use your phone?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.english: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.chinese: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.english: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.english: Use your imagination when planning meals.
sentences.chinese: 安排三餐时要动点脑筋。

sentences.english: She booked the flight using a false name.
sentences.chinese: 她用化名预订了航班。

detailed_translations.english: if you use a particular tool, method, service, ability etc, you do something with that tool, by means of that method etc, for a particular purpose

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用， 应用； 用途， 效用
detailed_translations.english: the action or fact of using something

sentences.english: I do the dishes every day, so I’m used to it.
sentences.chinese: 我每天洗盘子，所以习惯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 习惯的；二手的，使用过的
用（use的过去式）；（used to）过去常做

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.english: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.english: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.chinese: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.english: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

name: Bless you!
trans: 长命百岁！〔在别人打喷嚏时说的话〕

sentences.english: So, if you have a baggy tunic, cardigan or a simple dress, don't think twice about it, add an interesting belt!
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一件宽松的上衣，开襟羊毛衫或是一条简单的裙子，不用多想，直接佩戴一条腰带！

detailed_translations.chinese: 羊毛衫，开襟羊毛衫（等于cardigan sweater）
detailed_translations.english: a  sweater  similar to a short coat, fastened at the front with buttons or a zip

sentences.english: a clever man
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人

detailed_translations.english: able to learn and understand things quickly

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

sentences.english: Dear Sir or Madam, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的先生或女士，…

sentences.english: Dear Mrs. Wilson, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的威尔逊夫人，…

sentences.english: Dear Meg, ...
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的梅格，…

sentences.english: You're a lot like me, dear.
sentences.chinese: 你和我太像了，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: used before someone’s name or title to begin a letter
You can call someone dear as a sign of affection

sentences.english: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

sentences.english: She knows every student in the school.
sentences.chinese: 她认识学校里的每一个学生。

sentences.english: The buses go every 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车每隔10分钟发一班车。

detailed_translations.english: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

sentences.english: Ask your father to help you.
sentences.chinese: 叫你父亲帮你。

sentences.english: Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.english: I have sinned, Father.
sentences.chinese: 我有罪，神父。

sentences.english: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德是精神分析之父。

detailed_translations.english: a male parent

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

sentences.english: I've got to go home and zonk out.
sentences.chinese: 我只好回家睡大觉了。

sentences.english: He whispers to her: Let me go home with you.
sentences.chinese: 他向她喃喃低语：让我跟你一起回家吧。

sentences.english: Let them go home!
sentences.chinese: 让他们回家去！

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

sentences.english: Who knows the answer?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道答案？

sentences.english: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.english: Didn’t you know that?
sentences.chinese: 你不知道那件事吗？

sentences.english: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.chinese: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.english: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.english: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你想马上知道。

sentences.english: If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.chinese: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.english: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

detailed_translations.english: to have information about something

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.english: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

sentences.english: His mother and father are both doctors.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母都是医生。

sentences.english: the relationship between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的关系

sentences.english: Goodnight, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 晚安，妈妈。

sentences.english: Mother said they’d met at university.
sentences.chinese: 母亲说他们是在大学里认识的。

sentences.english: If food is scarce, the mother will feed the smaller, weaker chicks.
sentences.chinese: 如果食物稀少，母禽就喂较小、较弱的幼禽。

detailed_translations.english: a female parent of a child or animal

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: I left my music at home.
sentences.chinese: 我把乐谱落在家里了。

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

sentences.english: The next six months will be the hardest.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的六个月将是最难熬的。

sentences.english: The man in the next chair was asleep.
sentences.chinese: 邻座的男子睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: coming straight after sb/sth in time, order or space

sentences.english: There was a little girl sitting next to him.
sentences.chinese: 有个小女孩坐在他旁边。

detailed_translations.english: very close to someone or something, with no other person, building place, etc in between

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

sentences.english: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.chinese: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

detailed_translations.english: if two players, teams etc tie or are tied in a game or competition, they finish it with an equal number of points

detailed_translations.chinese: 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负
detailed_translations.english: a long narrow piece of cloth tied in a knot around the neck, worn by men

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: Please help us.
sentences.chinese: 请帮助我们。

sentences.english: He arranged for us all to have a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他安排我们大家一起喝一杯。

sentences.english: She’s invited us both.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩她都请了。

sentences.english: My mother is coming to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 我妈要来和我们同住。

sentences.english: Send us a donation now.
sentences.chinese: 现在就给我们捐款吧。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.english: a book about politics
sentences.chinese: 一本有关政治的书

sentences.english: She said something about leaving town.
sentences.chinese: 她说了些要离开镇子的话。

sentences.english: He lied about his age.
sentences.chinese: 他谎报年龄。

sentences.english: About that car of yours. How much are you selling it for?
sentences.chinese: 说到你的那辆车，你打算卖什么价钱？

sentences.english: What’s he on about (=  talking about  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 他在说什么呀？

sentences.english: It’s about Tommy, doctor. He’s been sick again.
sentences.chinese: 医生，是汤米，他又病了。

sentences.english: Jo sensed fear and jealousy all about her.
sentences.chinese: 乔感觉她周围充满恐惧和嫉妒。

detailed_translations.english: concerning or relating to a particular subject

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: Don’t disturb me while I’m working.
sentences.chinese: 我工作的时候不要打扰我。

sentences.english: Gemma was reading.
sentences.chinese: 吉玛正在看书。

sentences.english: They’ve been asking a lot of questions.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经问了许多问题。

sentences.english: That guy’s always causing trouble.
sentences.chinese: 那家伙总是惹麻烦。

sentences.english: We’ll be starting in about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们过一小时左右开始。

sentences.english: He isn’t leaving, is he?
sentences.chinese: 他不会走吧？

detailed_translations.english: used with a present participle to form the  continuous 4  tenses of verbs

sentences.english: He won the best actor award.
sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.english: What’s the best way to cook this fish?
sentences.chinese: 这鱼怎么烧最好？

sentences.english: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.english: Our pilots are given the best possible training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.english: We use only the very best ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

name: boring
trans: 无趣的，无聊的，乏味的，令人生厌的

sentences.english: Her husband is about the most boring person I’ve ever met.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫可以说是我见过的最无聊的人。

sentences.english: The job was dull and boring.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作枯燥乏味。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人厌烦的， 乏味的， 无聊的
detailed_translations.english: not interesting in any way

sentences.english: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
sentences.chinese: 他穿着什么样的衣服？

sentences.english: I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.english: He was still in his work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然穿着工作服。

sentences.english: a clothes shop
sentences.chinese: 服装店

detailed_translations.english: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm

sentences.english: the Scandinavian countries
sentences.chinese: 斯堪的纳维亚国家

sentences.english: developing countries
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家

sentences.english: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.chinese: 到国外旅行

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to live in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想住在乡下。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc

sentences.english: He unzipped his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他拉开夹克衫的拉链。

sentences.english: The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.english: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.chinese: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

detailed_translations.english: a short light coat

sentences.english: Among his many hobbies was the breeding of fine horses.
sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.chinese: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of people or things
many people

sentences.english: He kept pigs and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.english: I’ve spent the day dashing about from place to place.
sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.english: The place was full of screaming children.
sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: If my calculations are correct, we’re about ten miles from Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.english: You are absolutely correct, the Missouri is the longest river in the US.
sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.english: Some eyesight problems are relatively easy to correct.
sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

detailed_translations.english: having no mistakes
to make something right or to make it work the way it should

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

sentences.english: It takes me ten minutes to walk to work.
sentences.chinese: 我步行上班要用十分钟。

sentences.english: The train arrived at four minutes past eight.
sentences.chinese: 火车于八点零四分到达。

sentences.english: He returned a few minutes later.
sentences.chinese: 几分钟后他回来了。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the car in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 五分钟后我在车那儿和你见面。

sentences.english: Sam thought for a minute, then smiled at his brother.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆想了一下，然后冲着他的兄弟笑了。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour

sentences.english: It's already 9 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 已经9点钟了。

sentences.english: The meeting is at 10 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 开会时间是10点钟。

detailed_translations.english: one of the times when the clock shows the exact hour as a number from 1 to 12

sentences.english: The car was travelling at a very slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 汽车正以非常慢的速度行驶。

sentences.english: a slow walker
sentences.chinese: 慢慢走着的人

sentences.english: The economy faces a year of slower growth.
sentences.chinese: 经济将面临增长更缓慢的一年。

sentences.english: Take a few deep, slow breaths.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地深吸几口气。

sentences.english: I began to walk slower and slower.
sentences.chinese: 我开始走得越来越慢。

detailed_translations.english: not moving, being done, or happening quickly
In informal English, slower is used to mean "at a slower speed" and slowest is used to mean "at the slowest speed." In nonstandard English, slow is used to mean "with little speed."

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.english: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.english: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.chinese: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.english: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

name: Chinese leaves
trans: 白菜，青菜〔尤在东亚地区使用〕

sentences.english: He acquainted his classmate with my sister.
sentences.chinese: 他把我妹妹介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.english: He acquainted his classmate with my younger brother.
sentences.chinese: 他把我的弟弟介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.english: I, who am your classmate, can understand you.
sentences.chinese: 我是你的同班同学,能了解你。

detailed_translations.english: a member of the same class in a school, college or – in the US – a university

sentences.english: I like to eat cucumber sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃有黄瓜的三明治。

sentences.english: Have some cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 吃点黄瓜吧。

sentences.english: The "gurkophone" is one of their classics, made from a hollowed cucumber , a pepper and a carrot.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜管“是他们的经典乐器之一，那是用掏空的黄瓜、辣椒和胡萝卜做的。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin round vegetable with a dark green skin and a light green inside, usually eaten raw

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
sentences.chinese: 尽量多吃新鲜水果。

sentences.english: fruit and vegetables
sentences.chinese: 水果和蔬菜

sentences.english: a glass of fruit juice
sentences.chinese: 一杯果汁

sentences.english: a large garden with fruit trees
sentences.chinese: 种了果树的大花园

sentences.english: I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

sentences.english: a bunch of grapes
sentences.chinese: 一串葡萄

sentences.english: grape juice
sentences.chinese: 葡萄汁

sentences.english: red seedless grapes
sentences.chinese: 红色无籽葡萄

detailed_translations.english: one of a number of small round green or purple fruits that grow together on a  vine . Grapes are often used for making wine

name: group
trans: 〔演奏流行音乐的〕乐团，乐队，组合

sentences.english: He was surrounded by a group of admirers.
sentences.chinese: 他的身边围了一群仰慕者。

sentences.english: The photo shows four men grouped round a jeep.
sentences.chinese: 照片上是四个男人围着一辆吉普车。

detailed_translations.english: several people or things that are all together in the same place
to come together and form a group, or to arrange things or people together in a group

name: hmm
trans: 唔，嗯，哼〔表示怀疑停顿或不赞同的轻哼声〕

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: I’m going out for a bit – I’ll see you later.
sentences.chinese: 我出去一会儿——回头见。

detailed_translations.english: after the time you are talking about or after the present time

sentences.english: the new maths teacher
sentences.chinese: 新来的数学老师

sentences.english: maths lessons
sentences.chinese: 数学课

sentences.english: She got top marks in maths and chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 她数学和化学得了最高分。

detailed_translations.english: mathematics

sentences.english: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: I left my music at home.
sentences.chinese: 我把乐谱落在家里了。

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

sentences.english: Will you be home over the summer vacation?
sentences.chinese: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.english: Over a period of ten years he stole a million pounds from the company.
sentences.chinese: 他在10年间从公司偷走了100万英镑。

sentences.english: Can we talk about this over dinner?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否边吃饭边谈这个问题？

detailed_translations.english: during

sentences.english: Pick an orange, pick a pear.
sentences.chinese: 摘一个橙子，摘一个梨子。

sentences.english: I took this apple for a pear until I tasted it.
sentences.chinese: 我误将这个苹果当作梨子，直到我尝了才知道。

sentences.english: Is it a pear?
sentences.chinese: 这是一个梨子吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sweet juicy fruit that has a round base and is thinner near the top, or the tree that produces this fruit

sentences.english: salt and pepper
sentences.chinese: 盐和胡椒粉

detailed_translations.english: a powder that is used to add a hot taste to food
to add pepper to food

sentences.english: pineapple chunks
sentences.chinese: 菠萝块

sentences.english: pineapple juice
sentences.chinese: 菠萝汁

detailed_translations.chinese: [园艺] 菠萝；[园艺] 凤梨
detailed_translations.english: a large yellow-brown tropical fruit or its sweet juicy yellow flesh

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

sentences.english: This was demonstrated in a laboratory experiment with rats.
sentences.chinese: 这点通过在实验室中用老鼠做试验得到证明。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that looks like a large mouse with a long tail

name: science
trans: 〔理科的一门〕学科〔如生物、化学、物理〕；科学

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: Stop asking silly questions.
sentences.chinese: 别再问傻问题了。

sentences.english: You made a lot of silly mistakes .
sentences.chinese: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

sentences.english: I left my keys at home, which was a pretty silly thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 我干了件傻事，把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.english: ‘Shall we go for a walk?’ ‘ Don’t be silly , it’s dark.’
sentences.chinese: “我们去散步吧？”“别犯傻了，天都黑了。”

detailed_translations.english: not sensible, or showing bad judgment

name: So what?
trans: 那又怎么样？那又有什么关系？

sentences.english: Do you think that the spider can web anything?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这蜘蛛能用网捕住什么吗?

sentences.english: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.chinese: 在这整个蜘蛛出没的季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.english: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

detailed_translations.english: a small creature with eight legs, which catches insects using a fine network of sticky threads

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: tall
trans: 〔人，建筑物，树木等〕高的，高大的

sentences.english: He was young and tall.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，身材高大。

sentences.english: a house surrounded by tall trees
sentences.chinese: 大树环绕的房子

sentences.english: This bush grows tall very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 这种灌木很快就能长高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的
detailed_translations.english: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

sentences.english: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.chinese: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.english: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.english: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.chinese: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
detailed_translations.english: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

sentences.english: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.english: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.english: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

detailed_translations.english: a round soft red fruit eaten raw or cooked as a vegetable

sentences.english: The giraffe ranges in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.english: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

sentences.english: a shopping basket
sentences.chinese: 购物篮

sentences.english: a basket full of vegetables
sentences.chinese: 装满蔬菜的篮子

detailed_translations.chinese: 篮子；（篮球比赛的）得分；一篮之量；篮筐
detailed_translations.english: a container made of thin pieces of plastic, wire, or wood woven together, used to carry things or put things in

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

sentences.english: a clever man
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人

detailed_translations.english: able to learn and understand things quickly

sentences.english: a crocodile briefcase
sentences.chinese: 鳄鱼皮公文包

detailed_translations.english: a large  reptile  with a long mouth and many sharp teeth that lives in lakes and rivers in hot wet parts of the world

sentences.english: You should drink plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

sentences.english: Are you suggesting I’m too fat?
sentences.chinese: 你是不是在说我太胖了？

sentences.english: a short fat man in his early fifties
sentences.chinese: 一个五十岁出头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: You’ll get fat if you eat all that chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把那些巧克力都吃了，就会变胖的。

sentences.english: He looks much fatter than in his photo.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去比相片上胖多了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 肥的，胖的；油腻的；丰满的
detailed_translations.english: weighing too much because you have too much flesh on your body
a substance that is stored under the skin of people and animals, that helps to keep them warm

name: for
trans: 对于〔表示陈述或问题的对象〕

sentences.english: I’ve got a present for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有件礼物送给你。

sentences.english: Someone left a message for Vicky.
sentences.chinese: 有人给维基留了言。

sentences.english: an English course for foreign students
sentences.chinese: 为外国学生开的一门英语课程

sentences.english: WWhat did you do that for?
sentences.chinese: 你那样做是为了什么？

sentences.english: We could hardly see for the mist.
sentences.chinese: 由于雾气，我们几乎什么也看不见。

detailed_translations.english: used to say who is intended to get or use something, or where something is intended to be used

sentences.english: We were foxed by the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们被这个问题难住了。

detailed_translations.english: to confuse or deceive someone in a clever way
a wild animal like a dog with reddish-brown fur, a pointed face, and a thick tail

sentences.english: Researchers were given a £10,000 grant to continue their work.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员得到一万英镑的经费以继续他们的研究。

sentences.english: I’ve got some old diaries that my grandmother gave me years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我有几本旧日记本，是多年前祖母给我的。

sentences.english: I didn’t steal it! Maria gave it to me!
sentences.chinese: 我不是偷的！是玛丽亚给我的！

sentences.english: Most people are willing to give to charity .
sentences.chinese: 大多数人都愿意向慈善事业捐款。

sentences.english: The situation is now desperate, so please give generously .
sentences.chinese: 现在情况危急，请大家慷慨解囊。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have something as a present, or to provide something for someone

sentences.english: This photo of a hippo at Disney World has absolutely nothing to do with this post and only serves to confuse things.
sentences.chinese: 这张迪斯尼世界河马照片绝对与本文章毫无关联，放这里只会让你莫名其妙。

sentences.english: "One thing we know about the Herto people, they had a taste for meat, especially hippos, " White said, brushing some sand off a hippo skull.
sentences.chinese: “我们知道赫托人已经开始吃肉了，尤其是河马肉，”怀特一边说着，一边将一具河马头骨上的沙土拭去。

sentences.english: Described as one of the most aggressive creatures in the animal kingdom, an adult hippo can apply several tons of pressure in a single bite.
sentences.chinese: 成年河马是动物王国里最有攻击力的家伙之一，它一嘴咬下来的压力就能有好几吨。

detailed_translations.english: a hippopotamus

sentences.english: He emphasized its importance to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我强调它的重要性。

sentences.english: The child read the story but did not comprehend its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子读了这篇故事，但不能理解它的意思。

sentences.english: The company disseminated information about its new programmes.
sentences.chinese: 公司传播有关其新计划的信息。

sentences.english: The wounded lion bellowed out.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的狮子发出了怒吼。

sentences.english: The lion bounded on the prey.
sentences.chinese: 那头狮子向猎物猛扑过去。

sentences.english: The savages darted spears at the lion.
sentences.chinese: 野蛮人们把矛掷向狮子。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

sentences.english: I have no more questions.
sentences.chinese: 我没问题了。

sentences.english: The film deserves more attention from the public.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片应受到公众的更多注意。

sentences.english: The accident taught him to be more careful.
sentences.chinese: 这起事故的教训使他变得更小心。

detailed_translations.english: a greater amount or number
having a particular quality to a greater degree

sentences.english: The day ended much as it began.
sentences.chinese: 这一天结束时还像开始时一样。

sentences.english: I don’t have much money with me.
sentences.chinese: 我身上没带很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: by a great amount
a large amount of something

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.english: a sheep farmer
sentences.chinese: 养羊的农民

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

sentences.english: She taught me fractions and counting.
sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

detailed_translations.english: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

sentences.english: It’s a long walk. Maybe we should get the bus.
sentences.chinese: 走着去很远，或许我们应该乘公共汽车。

sentences.english: Rosanna and Forbes walked in silence.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎娜与福布斯默默地走着。

sentences.english: We walked into the foyer.
sentences.chinese: 我们走进前厅。

sentences.english: I walked a few steps toward the fence.
sentences.chinese: 我向栅栏走了几步。

detailed_translations.english: a journey that you make by walking, especially for exercise or enjoyment
When you walk, you move forward by putting one foot in front of the other in a regular way

sentences.english: a pack of wolves
sentences.chinese: 一群狼

detailed_translations.english: a wild animal that looks like a large dog and lives and hunts in groups
to eat something very quickly, swallowing it in big pieces

sentences.english: a swarm of bees
sentences.chinese: 一群蜜蜂

sentences.english: a bee sting
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂蜇伤

detailed_translations.english: a black and yellow flying insect that makes  honey  and can sting you

sentences.english: solid gold watches
sentences.chinese: 纯金手表

sentences.english: gold watch/chain/ring etc
sentences.chinese: 金表/链/戒指 等

detailed_translations.english: a valuable soft yellow metal that is used to make coins, jewellery etc. It is a chemical element: symbol Au
made of gold

sentences.english: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.chinese: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.english: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.chinese: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.english: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.chinese: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it

sentences.english: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.english: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.chinese: 她为人不太好。

sentences.english: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.chinese: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.english: ‘Can we go to the park?’ ‘No, not today, dear.’
sentences.chinese: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

detailed_translations.english: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

sentences.english: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.chinese: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.english: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.english: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

sentences.english: an old man
sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.english: Are you older than Sally?
sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.english: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.english: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.chinese: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。
